title: The Nature of science: how ideas change
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and Dick Larson
brief_description: Scientific ideas are shown to be in a continual stage of modification and change. We investigate how and why scientific ideas change and in so doing clarify the criteria used to evaluate them, such as their accuracy, simplicity, productivity and scope. For primary grades.
